segments.text: I think I'll get some new goggles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . I'll get some , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We also need some sunscreen . What about beach towels ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . We have to have something to lie on while we're catching some rays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I'll get a hat , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No hat for me , but I'm getting this cool pair of shades .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I guess that's it . Let's go pay for this stuff .
segments.speaker: S1
